name: BloodThirst
description:
In BloodThirst You’re starting as an apprentice on your way to learn blood magic.

But be careful what you wish for, cause every spell will cost you your own blood.

Will you be able to successfully master the blood magic and defeat every room?

There are strong enemies waiting for you. Each more challenging than the one before.

Are you able to defeat all of them and clear every room?

First Game Jam

By: Timo Gass
